localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: In the information age, access to global networking is a basic human right. We made the Abacus because the world deserves an affordable & biodegradable PC that is made with the same care and craftsmanship as a Mac.
blogPost.body: In the information age, access to global networking is a basic human right. We made the Abacus because the world deserves an affordable & biodegradable PC that is made with the same care and craftsmanship as a Mac.
blogPost.title: The Abacus - Affordable and biodegradable PC
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 在信息时代，使用全球网络是一项基本人权。我们制造算盘是因为这个世界理应拥有一台价格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的制造工艺和工艺与Mac一样。
localize.tagline: 价格实惠、可生物降解的PC

localize.description: 在信息時代，使用全球網絡是一項基本人權。我們製造算盤是因爲這個世界理應擁有一臺價格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的製造工藝和工藝與Mac一樣。
localize.tagline: 價格實惠、可生物降解的PC

previous.excerpt: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
previous.title: ZenML - Create reproducible machine learning pipelines

localize.description: 有没有花了几个小时训练ML模型，结果却让它们在生产中崩溃和烧毁？ZenML在这里提供帮助。跟踪元数据、比较结果并扩展到云。它是开源的、可扩展的，并且与现成的久经考验的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 创建可重现的机器学习管道

localize.description: 有沒有花了幾個小時訓練ML模型，結果卻讓它們在生產中崩潰和燒燬？ZenML在這裏提供幫助。跟蹤元數據、比較結果並擴展到雲。它是開源的、可擴展的，並且與現成的久經考驗的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 創建可重現的機器學習管道

房地產熱潮仍在繼續，美國房價再次創下歷史新高，在過去一年裏上漲了8%。https://t.co/PmsgrlG6TJ
